snippet: Prince Zeid Ra’ad Zeid al-Hussein, Jordan’s ambassador to the United Nations, was nominated to replace Navi Pillay as high commissioner for human rights.
abstract: United Nations Secretary General Ban Ki-moon nominates Prince Zeid Ra'ad Zeid al-Hussein, Jordan's ambassador to the United Nations, to be the agency's next high commissioner for human rights.
lead_paragraph: Prince Zeid Ra’ad Zeid al-Hussein, Jordan’s ambassador to the United Nations, was nominated to replace Navi Pillay as high commissioner for human rights.

headline.main: U.N. Chief Picks Jordanian Prince for Rights Post
headline.print_headline: U.N. Chief Picks Jordanian Prince for Rights Post
